==Memories of the Past Year==
*[[Statue of The Seven]], guide my way...
*Talent activated: No chest will escape my gaze!
*I am a courageous adventurer who has conquered all the [[domains]]!
*Woohoo, your companion's [[Friendship Level]] has increased!
*No enemy is undefeatable when teamed up with other Travelers!
*The [[Spiral Abyss]] is full of danger? For the [[Spiral Abyss/Chamber's Bounty|Star's Bounty]], let's go!
*[[Commissions]]? [[Bounties]]? Leave it all to me!
*I have memorized all the [[Mining Outcrops|mining points]] in [[Teyvat]]! Trust me, I'm the expert!
*Fighting alongside my friends in Teyvat is my most treasured memory.
*Creating the most cozy and comfortable [[Serenitea Pot]] to give my companions a place to call "home."

==Goals for the Coming Year==
*Get to know other Travelers, to exchange discuss adventure experiences!
*Conquer the [[Spiral Abyss]]! Collect all the stars!
*Working hard alongside everyone to protect Teyvat!
*Here's hoping that my wallet never runs out of [[Mora]]!
*No [[Chests|treasure chest]] will get by me, heh!
*Hoping to leave my mark and explore all of Teyvat, down to each nook and cranny!
*Hopefully I can meet more new friends on my next trip!
*If you have time to kill, come join me in the Serenitea Pot!
*Explore even more regions, and enjoy the beautiful scenery along the way~
*Learn more about Teyvat's history, and create new stories with your companions!
